name: FEED AND GROW MULTIPLAYER
description:
Hunt and eat other fish multiplayer to grow into larger beasts!

This animal survival game based in the fish world! You start as a goldfish, but you can get the piranhas and bibos’. You start at the bottom of the food chain, but you can be the peak if you eat smaller fish than you, because your body will grow and you will be able to eat bigger and bigger fish.


Features:
-Multiplayer
-Proportionate physical growth
-Amazing water and light effects
